question.text: A stage in cell division is shown in the figure. Select the answer which gives correct identification of the stage with its characteristics

options.text:
$$
\begin{aligned}
& \text { Telophase - Nuclear envelope } \\
& \text { reforms, Golgi complex } \\
& \text { reforms } \\
&
\end{aligned}
$$

solution.text: Telophase is reserve of prophase. The chromosome that have reached their respective polar decondense and their individually. Late anaphase is characterised by centromeres split and chromatid separate and chromatid move to opposite poles. Cytokinesis is process in which cell itself is divided two daughter cells.
